name: sftpgo
tagline: A full featured file transfer server with web admin
description: SFTPGo is a fully featured SFTP, FTP, WebDAV, and HTTP file server. It supports virtual users, storage backends, quotas, and a modern admin web UI, making it ideal for secure self-hosted file transfer.

features.title: Virtual Users
features.description: Creates isolated user accounts with individual permissions and quotas

features.title: Cloud Storage
features.description: Supports local filesystem, S3, Azure Blob, Google Cloud Storage, and more

features.title: Quota Management
features.description: Enforces storage limits and bandwidth restrictions per user

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manages users, folders, and settings through a modern web interface

features.title: Public Key Authentication
features.description: Secures SFTP access with SSH key pairs instead of passwords

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Maps multiple storage locations to a single user's directory tree

features.title: Webhook Support
features.description: Triggers custom scripts or webhooks on file uploads, downloads, or deletions
